abstract.t: Source Address Validation Improvement (SAVI) effort aims tocomplement ingress filtering with finer-grained, standardized IPsource address validation. This document describes threats enabledby IP source address spoofing both in the global and finer-grainedcontext, describes currently available solutions and challenges, andprovides a starting point analysis for finer-grained (hostgranularity) anti-spoofing work.
